title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work consistently
description: When trying to close all saved files using the 'Close All Saved' option from the file menu, the expected behavior is that the file should be closed without any changes being made. However, this is not happening consistently.
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code and following the steps below:
EB: The file should be closed without any changes being made.
SR:
1. Open multiple files in the editor.
2. Create a new file 'f1.txt'.
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
